home_desc: Welcome to CodeBits Platform demo website. Change this desctiption in homepage language package.
hello_sub: This is demo page of your new website based on CodeBits Platform. For manage your website - go to the control panel. And you can change this text in the translation module.
creative_desc: Simple and lightweight framework with most important components.
feat1_desc: Designed on the Singleton basics, MVC framework under the hood, shows a high speed of operation
feat2_desc: Light and not overloaded platform is ready for production. Develop perfect project with CBP
feat3_desc: It already contains API support, built-in control panel, authorization system and much more
